wiki.content: The A Thousand Years Songfacts says that Perri wrote this song based on the emotions that she felt reading about the star-crossed love affair between Edward and Bella throughout Stephenie Meyer's series of books. American singer/songwriter and musician Christina Judith Perri hails from Philadelphia, USA. 'A Thousand Years' was recorded for the movie 'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn'. Christina will be releasing her second studio album this spring. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The A Thousand Years Songfacts says that Perri wrote this song based on the emotions that she felt reading about the star-crossed love affair between Edward and Bella throughout Stephenie Meyer's series of books. American singer/songwriter and musician Christina Judith Perri hails from Philadelphia, USA. 'A Thousand Years' was recorded for the movie 'The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn'. Christina will be releasing her second studio album this spring.

track.name: A Thousand Years
comments: The most beautiful love song I've ever heard. [3]
I have loved you for a thousand years......beautiful singer, song & lyrics....♥♫♥
Reminds me of 'I Know You Care' by Ellie Goulding, but much happier.
The most beautiful love song I've ever heard. [2]
The most beautiful love song I've ever heard.

yo te he amado 
Durante mil años 
Te amaré por mil años más <3
This is a beautiful love song, so full of emotion that I can taste it. Misty eyed. No need for anyone to do a cover of this song. Christina owns it, and nobody could improve upon perfection.

Love this song, what a pity it was in such a crap movie, ah well at least the song stands on it's own merits. First heard a cover version of this, but have to say no-one can sing the orignal like CP, superb..... liquid emotion!

Listened to this song before but never got into it. Until now. And yes I'm here because of Sherlock [7]. Alone on the Water was so completely heart wrenching. I'm still fighting back tears an hour after reading the fanfic and watching the video for the first time.
Listened to this song before but never got into it. Until now. And yes I'm here because of Sherlock [6]. Ah, my feelings... ;_;
i love this song so much, could listen to it over and over
nice song in a shitty movie. just like clair de lune and muse
i've never seen the movie, but this is a great song.
I cried like a baby when this starts on Breaking Dawn Part 2 [8]
essa musica é perfeita demais, muito linda
